sourcesContent:
<template>
    <el-input
      v-model="searchTerm"
      placeholder="请输入要搜索的设备名称"
      suffix-icon="el-icon-search"
      @keyup.enter="handleSearch"
    />
  </template>
  
  <script>
  import { ref } from 'vue';
  
  export default {
    setup() {
      const searchTerm = ref('');
  
      const handleSearch = () => {
        window.location.href = `http://localhost:8080/search?equipmentname=${searchTerm.value}`;
      };
  
      return {
        searchTerm,
        handleSearch,
      };
    },
  };
  </script>
